summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.2°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles) and dew point temperature (up 3.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 135.8m higher than yesterday, 186.8m higher than past week, 256.7m higher than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 332m to a maximum of 1648m, averaging 1126.8m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 940.0m and 870.1m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; extreme heat is expected, potentially dangerous in the sun. Also, air moisture should feel ok and some wind, breezy at times. A few light raindrops may fall, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and strong and powerful sunlight. Little change in the weather.
